old:
オーク軍が拠点とする北西の荒地
バートランド平原以北は魔物の支配する厳しい地
であるが、ドラワンの民は故郷を守り今日まで暮ら
してきた。また、北にかかる巨大な橋は《禁じられ
た地》に続くとされ、この地の者さえ近づかない
new:
The barren land in the northwest that serves as the base for the Orc army.
The area north of Betland Plains is a harsh land ruled by enemies, but the people of Drawan have managed to protect their homeland and live to this day. Furthermore, it is said that the enormous bridge to the north leads to the "Forbidden Land," a place even the locals dare not approach.

old:
オークの根城に近い辺境の村
人がハイデル平原以南での防衛を決めてからこれ
まで、外部との交流はほとんど途絶えていた
厳しい環境ながら、故郷に残ると決めた者達により
村は守られ、細々と営みは続けられている
new:
A remove village, located near the orc stronghold.
Has had little contact with the outside world since the people decided to defend themselves in the southern Hidell Plains. Despite the harsh conditions, the villagers who chose to stay in their homeland have managed to protect the village and continue their modest livelihood.

old:
オーク軍が根城とする旧時代の大砦
かつては立派な外堀を持つ騎士団の砦だったが
白竜が墜ちて後オークに占領され、恐ろしい魔物の
城と化した。首領モゴックが手勢を率い、この砦を
起点にハイデルへの侵略を企てている
new:
Formerly a fortress of the knight's order that had an impressive moat.
It has now been occupied by orcs after the fall of the White Dragon, transforming into a terrifying stronghold of monstrous creatures. 
The leader Mogok leads his forces from this fortress, plotting an invasion of Heidell.

old:
バートランド北部からセラー湖の岸辺に繋がる
地下道。ガルドノック砦がオークに占領される前
騎士団が通り道や保管庫として作ったものである
らしい。もちろん、現在利用している人間はいない
new:
An underground passage from the northern part of Betland to the shores of Lake Cera. 
It seems that the knight order built it as a thoroughfare and storage facility before Gardnox Fortress was occupied by orcs. 
Of course, there are no humans currently using it.

old:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
《ガルドノック砦》の奥から続き、テゴル川の水を
堀へと引き込むための水廊。未だオークが根城とする
この場所に、侵食の影響を受けた個体が存在している
らしい。脅威が拡散する前に、芽を摘む必要がある
new:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Continuing from the depths of Gardnox Fortress, this water corridor is used to draw the water from the Tegor River into the moat. 
It seems that there are infected individuals affected by corruption still inhabiting this place, which the orcs still use as their stronghold. 
It is necessary to nip this threat in the bud before it spreads.
